name: The Box Finder (TBF)
description:
In 2169, an inventor known as "Sir Nikia Lokita" invents a robotic sphere to help improve the Number 1 International Courier Service Agency (ICSA Express). He named the robotic sphere "The Box Finder". The Box Finder (TBF) mission is going to the World Between Worlds (WBW) to get at least 3 boxes in the speed of light. So, you as TBF needs to collect 3 boxes to help ICSA Express. (Actually, you need to collect 30 boxes :D).

My story is great, right? (Dev)

Dev Story :

  • This game is created by the "Not so good dev" (NikFree) {13 y/o dev}
  • This game is simple and fun  3d-platformer game (maybe). It just has 10 levels but simple doesn't mean easy (maybe it is not easy)
  • This is the first time I make a game so this game may be not so good.
  • You can reset the game if you feel like you want to challenge your friend (speedrun). (but I know you won't use this feature because your friend can just download it here)
  • The speed of TBF is not always the same. That's means you are getting faster and faster (I know you all know what it means BTW).
  • I created this game using Unity Game Engine and some other help from the Internet (www.turbosquid.com and CO.AG Music).
  • Wait, Did I deserve the title "Dev" for making this not so good game?
  • WARNING : Bad grammar detected.

Controls =
Press "A" button - teleport to the left.
Press "D" button - teleport to the right.
---------------------------------------------------------------
Press "Esc" button - pause.
Press "R" button - restart.
